mapper.sql: id, userId, orgId, remark, status, createDate, updateDate
mapper.insert: insert into org_admin (id, userId, orgId, remark, status, createDate, updateDate) values (#{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{userId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{orgId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{status,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{createDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{updateDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP})
mapper.update: update org_admin set userId = #{userId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, orgId = #{orgId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, remark = #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, status = #{status,jdbcType=CHAR}, createDate = #{createDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, updateDate = #{updateDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} where id = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
